bwwExcerpt: Natasha Katz updates the lighting, and her work is exquisite. The musical's ending - that famous moment when one of the cats ascends to "the Heavyside Layer" for rebirth in another of her nine lives - is a visual knockout. And, to be honest, primarily because of Katz's lighting it's an emotional kno...
